transcript:
Customer: Sir aapne time diya tha call receive nahi kar paye.


Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Sripal sir. Haan sir Hemant baat kar raha hun. Aapne bola tha na Hemant ji 6:30 baje mujhe phone kariyega.
Customer: Haan haan haan boliye.
Executive: Haan. Sir dekho bas main yehi janne ke liye phone kar raha tha jaise aapne not satisfied sir diya kyunki aapne meri team se meri baat hui thi ki sir ne aapko not satisfied kyun diya to wo bol rahe the sir humne kai baar sir ko call kar diya sir ke sath mother ki kisi ke tabiyat kharab tha aap tab time nahi de paye phone nahi utha paye sir. Hamari team ne aapko kai baar phone kar diya iski vajah se sir aapne not satisfied de diya. Right sir yahi baat thi?
Customer: Haan haan. Ye aadhi baat hai.
Executive: Achcha aadhi baat hai. Theek hai sir. Ye aapke side ki baat hai na.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Sahi hai na. Haan aadhi baat ye hai ki aapke jo jo koi bhi wo manager rahegi relationship manager wo hame call kar rahi thi. Theek hai. I totally agree ki wo ek dedh mahine se call kar rahi thi ya kuch messages kar rahi thi. Theek hai. Lekin unka jo messages jo unhone kare hue hai na that was not polite one wo aise aap phone kyun nahi utha rahe ho. Achcha achcha. Aapko order dena hai ya dispatch karna hai jaisa.
Customer: Haan exactly exactly.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir.
Customer: Exactly. Haan to abhi dikkat ye thi ki main totally samajh sakta hun ki aap irritate hoge koi agar samne wala phone nahi utha raha hai to lekin kuch genuine reason bhi hote hain.
Executive: Bilkul sir koi bhi itna ignore nahi karega jaan bujh ke koi bhi aapko bhi sir koi dikkat hua hai nahi India mart se koi issue rahega tabhi aap kar rahe ho paisa diye ho aapne.
Customer: Exactly exactly. Abhi dikkat ye thi ki iske pehle jo Akhilesh ya Abhilesh Maurya karke the wo the manager. Theek hai. To unko maine ye baat batai thi ki mere pitaji jo hai wo serious disease pe suffer kar rahe hain to main abhi wo services nahi use kar pa raha hun to jo kuch bhi nuksan ho raha hai wo mujhe samajh raha hai lekin wo mera khud ka nuksan hai to abhi ke liye filhal abhi jo meri priority hai wo mera business nahi hai wo mere father hai karke.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul sir family se bada kabhi kuch nahi hoga.
Customer: To abhi wo wo hone ke baad September ke end mein mere father ki death hui uske baad main yahan ke rituals vagera sari cheeze main kar raha hun. Abhi phone rakhte samay aapke madam hame bol rahi hai ki sir isme se do minute ka time to aap nikal hi sakte ho messages ke liye. Main unko bol raha hun madam main state of mind ki baat kar raha hun ki main kis state of mind mein hun.
Customer: Agar dekhiye ye main abhi jo baat bolne ja raha hun wo achchi nahi hai lekin agar aap apne parents se pyar nahi karte iska matlab ye nahi ki har koi apne parents se pyar nahi karta hai.
Executive: Sahi baat hai.
Customer: Mera aur mere father ka relation kya hai wo mujhe pata hai unka connect kya hai wo mujhe pata hai main state of mind mein nahi hun koi kaam karne ke liye main mujhe pata hai main 10 lakh ka nuksan 50 lakh ka nuksan main seh sakta hun. Lekin wo wo cheez mere wo mere family se badi cheez nahi hai. To main nahi reply kar raha hun to mujhe do minute ke liye message nahi karta are mujhe pata nahi hai kya do minute nahi lagte whatsapp karne ke liye.
Executive: Sahi sir aap bilkul sahi ho main unse bol dunga.
Customer: Aaj bhi udhar wo text message mein message dal de ki can you see this. Can you see this ka matlab kya hota hai who are you to order me.
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi baat hai sir sahi keh rahe ho aap.
Customer: Are aap 10 baar nahi aap 10 lakh baar call kijiye main samajh raha hun ki aapki bhi duty hai aapki bhi sari cheeze main us cheez ke liye agree hi kar raha hun na main deny kar hi nahi raha hun.
Executive: Haan main aap itna understood bhi kar rahe ho sir aap bhi samajh rahe ho ki koi job kar raha hai kar raha hai apne kaam ki taraf but aapki situation hai isliye sare cheez mein hum kuch bhi nahi kar sakte sir.
Customer: Mujhe pata hai na nuksan mera hi hai usme at the end nuksan mera hi ho raha hai maine agar kuch paise bhare hue hai uska business aap bhi genuinely achche cheez ke liye hi mujhe call kar rahe ho ya feedback le rahe hain. Lekin nahi hai samne wala wo batane ki cheez mein aaj maine kam se kam teen char mahine se maine mera jo main office se nahi gaya hun factory mein nahi gaya hun ab tak.
Executive: Dekh raha hun sir aapne.
Customer: Main suffer kar raha hun us cheez se lekin wo samajhna chahiye thoda sa aisa nahi hota hai har cheez.
Executive: Nahi nahi theek hai main.
Customer: Theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi sir main aage se unse bol deta hun aapko thoda politely hum sorry bol raha hun unke liye.
Customer: Koi nahi unko maine bola hai aap 8 tarikh ke baad connect kariye karke uske baad dekhte hain fir main karta hun uske baad.
Executive: Bilkul sahi bilkul sahi aur main sir yahan pe unka feedback aata to main close karunga sir is feedback ko kyunki wo senior hun to mujhe baat karni thi sir kyunki aapne not satisfied diya to aapke liye janna zaruri hai sir ki kya baat thi to main isko bhi close karunga sir please feedback dega to usko satisfy kar lijiyega sir koi dikkat nahi main 8 tarikh ko bolta hun 8 tarikh se pehle call nahi jayega sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay okay.
Executive: Okay thank you for your time sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received impolite messages from relationship manager.

- Customer's father passed away recently.

- Customer is not in the state of mind to work.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the impolite messages.

- Executive assured to close the feedback.

- Executive will inform the team to call after 8th.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- impolite messages, relationship manager, death, feedback
